//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "huey_gun01", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	set ( "SET_ENABLE", "0" );
	set ( "SET_FACE_TARGET", "player" );
}


affect ( "huey_gun02", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	set ( "SET_ENABLE", "0" );
	set ( "SET_FACE_TARGET", "player" );
}

wait ( 100.000 );

affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	use ( "huey_gun01" );
	use ( "huey_gun02" );
}
